name: Dicywiz
description:
Youre a wizard!

Use the magic dices to power your wand and have a original wand every run trough randomly generated level. 

Prepare thyself and download now!

Made for the GMTK 2022 game jam in 48 hours

Made by the programming wizards: 

ChaoticAurora & Twenmod

(At room 100 there is an unfinished boss fight ;)  )
